plot outline: Bhagya, a girl born in a lower middle-class family, has seen over 60 men for an arranged alliance, but is still unmarried. She decides to take matters into her own hands and sets out to find a match for her herself through her own trails. What follows are a series of misadventures.
title: Pathibeku.com
plot: Bhagya, a girl born in a lower middle-class family, has seen over 60 men for an arranged alliance, but is still unmarried. She decides to take matters into her own hands and sets out to find a match for her herself through her own trails. What follows are a series of misadventures.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
